resources.string: Unless you defend the precious things you posses… People will take them away from you
This is hopeless… The air must be thin up there it\'s made you delirious
Vile lodge of swine who use sophistry in an attempt to oppress and control us
Position, physique, technique, equipment all of them work against you in this place
And to protect their stunted self-esteem, they depend on it, all while hating it .... Cravenly..... Deceitfully ....

You.. dare ask my name? Banish the thought from your head, girl. To learn it would place your life in jeopardy. Countless women have learned my name only to find themselves targets of the organisation. Sarah in America, Claudia in italy, Simon in France… I won\'t put anyone else in danger
Study normal subject, find a normal job Fall in love normally, get married normally Have a normal family, and have a normal life But being normal has nothing to do with us!
Don\'t prattle on so proudly while you… … Strike at someone from such a safe place
If word gets out that we walked home together, It will be an ETERNAL EMBARRASSMENT
